allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: SuperMarket management system with Excel import

- Add ASP.NET Core Web API backend with Entity Framework Core
- Add Angular frontend application
- Implement Product, Category, Transaction, and Inventory models
- Add Excel import functionality for products (3,839 products)
- Update Product model with additional fields:
  * ProductType, Brand, Unit, MaxStockLevel, Weight, Location
  * DirectSalesEnabled, PointsEnabled
- Add comprehensive .gitignore for .NET and Angular projects
- Include test scripts for Excel import functionality

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add category hierarchy, pagination, PrimeNG table, and UI improvements

Backend changes:
- Add category hierarchy with parent-child relationships
- Create migration AddCategoryHierarchy for self-referencing Category model
- Add PaginatedResult model for paginated API responses
- Implement paged products endpoint with search and sorting
- Update CategoryDto with parent/child fields
- Update CategoriesController to return DTOs with hierarchy
- Add GetProductsPagedAsync to ProductService
- Create Python script to reorganize categories from flat to hierarchical structure

Frontend changes:
- Replace custom grid with PrimeNG p-table component
- Add lazy loading, pagination, and sorting to product list
- Integrate PrimeFlex CSS utility framework
- Generate TypeScript API client using NSwag
- Update all components to use generated API client
- Remove manual service/model files in favor of generated client
- Add SVG placeholder image for products without images
- Update font family to system font stack for PrimeNG components
- Add responsive layout and styling improvements

Data migration:
- Parse 311 categories into 316 unique hierarchical categories
- Reorganize 70 root categories and 246 sub-categories
- Update 3,839 products to use leaf categories

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
